item.description:
Pre-Valentine's Day Dinner - Location: Cambridge Area
Details:
This is a progressive dinner where the men will change tables at each course. This gives everyone a chance to spend time and have conversation with new friends. The goal is to have equal numbers of men and women. Our private dining room will have 5 tables of 8. If you're a man, go ahead and give your "yes" rsvp. If you're a woman that would like to attend, you must bring a +1 man. When you rsvp "yes" list the first name of your male guest. There will be a cocktail hour, followed by a 4 course sit down dinner.

DETAILS:

Frank's Steakhouse owner, George Ravanis has put together a special 4-course dinner for the evening. Grilled chicken over steamed spinach and chantilly potato entree. Vegan and vegetarian alternatives available. Link to complete menu to follow. Complete price including all courses, dessert, coffee and soft drinks........$29.50pp.

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Plus One Progressive Dinner Party
